#########################
Function Documentation 
#########################

*************************
Giotto Handing Functions
*************************

=======================

	  - Description

	  - Show Gene Metadata

	  - Create Average Metagene

	  - Find Spatial Neighbors 

  
Giotto Processing Functions 
=================================

*Functions that will (help to) add, update or change the Giotto object when processing spatial data.*

.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 2
	:hidden:

	filterDistributions </subsections/md_rst/filterDistributions.rst>
	filterCombinations </subsections/md_rst/filterCombinations.rst>
	normalizeGiotto </subsections/md_rst/normalizeGiotto.rst>
	adjustGiottoMatrix </subsections/md_rst/adjustGiottoMatrix.rst>
	annotateGiotto </subsections/md_rst/annotateGiotto.rst>
	removeCellAnnotation </subsections/md_rst/removeCellAnnotation.rst>
	removeGeneAnnotation </subsections/md_rst/removeGeneAnnotation.rst>
	addCellMetadata </subsections/md_rst/addCellMetadata.rst>
	addGeneMetadata </subsections/md_rst/addGeneMetadata.rst>
	addGeneStatistics </subsections/md_rst/addGeneStatistics.rst>
	addCellStatistics </subsections/md_rst/addCellStatistics.rst>
	addStatistics </subsections/md_rst/addStatistics.rst>
	addGenesPerc </subsections/md_rst/addGenesPerc.rst>
	addCellIntMetadata </subsections/md_rst/addCellIntMetadata.rst>

.. list-table:: 
	:widths: 100 100 
	:header-rows: 1
	
	* - Function 
	  - Description 
	* - :doc:`filterDistributions() </subsections/md_rst/filterDistributions>`
	  - Show Gene Distributions
	* - :doc:`filterCombinations() </subsections/md_rst/filterCombinations>`
	  - Show Gene/Cell Loss 
	* - :doc:`normalizeGiotto() </subsections/md_rst/normalizeGiotto>`
	  - Normalize And/Or Scale Expression Values 
	* - :doc:`adjustGiottoMatrix() </subsections/md_rst/adjustGiottoMatrix>`
	  - Adjust Expression Values 
	* - :doc:`annotateGiotto() </subsections/md_rst/annotateGiotto>`
	  - Convert Cluster Results Into User Provided Annotation 
	* - :doc:`removeCellAnnotation() </subsections/md_rst/removeCellAnnotation>`
	  - Remove Cell Annotation 
	* - :doc:`removeGeneAnnotation() </subsections/md_rst/removeGeneAnnotation>`
	  - Remove Gene Annotation 
	* - :doc:`addCellMetadata() </subsections/md_rst/addCellMetadata>`
	  - Add Cell Metadata
	* - :doc:`addGeneMetadata()</subsections/md_rst/addGeneMetadata>`
	  - Add Gene Metadatat
	* - :doc:`addGeneStatistics() </subsections/md_rst/addGeneStatistics>`
	  - Add Gene Statistics
	* - :doc:`addCellStatistics() </subsections/md_rst/addCellStatistics>`
	  - Add Cell Statistics
	* - :doc:`addStatistics() </subsections/md_rst/addStatistics>`
	  - Add Gene and Cell Statistics
	* - :doc:`addGenesPerc() </subsections/md_rst/addGenesPerc>`
	  - Calculate Percent Counts
	* - :doc:`addCellIntMetadata() </subsections/md_rst/addCellIntMetadata>`
	  - Add Cell Metadata Information Column

	  - Compute Highly Variable Genes
	* - :doc:`signPCA() </subsections/md_rst/signPCA>`
	  - Identify PC's
	* - :doc:`screePlot() </subsections/md_rst/screePlot>`
	  - Identify Significant PCs Via Screeplot
	* - :doc:`jackstrawPlot() </subsections/md_rst/jackstrawPlot>`
	  - Identify Significant PCs Via JackstrawPlot

	  - Run A PCA
	* - :doc:`runUMAP() </subsections/md_rst/runUMAP>`
	  - Run A UMAP
	* - :doc:`runtSNE() </subsections/md_rst/runtSNE>`
	  - Run a tSNE

	doLouvainCluster </subsections/md_rst/doLouvainCluster.rst>
	doKmeans </subsections/md_rst/doKmeans.rst>
	doHclust </subsections/md_rst/doHclust.rst>
	subClusterCells </subsections/md_rst/subClusterCells.rst>
	doLeidenSubCluster </subsections/md_rst/doLeidenSubCluster.rst>
	doLouvainSubCluster </subsections/md_rst/doLouvainSubCluster.rst>
	getClusterSimilarity </subsections/md_rst/getClusterSimilarity.rst>

	getDendrogramSplits </subsections/md_rst/getDendrogramSplits.rst>

	:widths: 100 100 
	:header-rows: 1

	* - Function
	  - Description 	
	* - :doc:`createNearestNetwork() </subsections/md_rst/createNearestNetwork>`
	  - Create NN Network 
	* - :doc:`addNetworkLayout() </subsections/md_rst/addNetworkLayout>`
	  - Add Network Layout
	* - :doc:`extractNearestNetwork() </subsections/md_rst/extractNearestNetwork>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Score
	* - :doc:`clusterCells() </subsections/md_rst/clusterCells>`
	  - Cluster Cells 
	* - :doc:`doLeidenCluster() </subsections/md_rst/doLeidenCluster>`
	  - Cluster Cells Using NN-Network
	* - :doc:`doLouvainCluster() </subsections/md_rst/doLouvainCluster>`
	  - Cluster Cells Using NN-Network and Louvain Algorithm
	* - :doc:`doKmeans() </subsections/md_rst/doKmeans>`
	  - Cluster Cells Using K-Means
	* - :doc:`doHclust() </subsections/md_rst/doHclust>`
	  - Cluster Cells Using Hierarchical Clustering
	* - :doc:`subClusterCells() </subsections/md_rst/subClusterCells>`
	  - Sub-Cluster Cells
	* - :doc:`doLeidenSubCluster() </subsections/md_rst/doLeidenSubCluster>`
	  - Further Sub-Clustering of Cells Using NN-Network and Leiden Algorithm
	* - :doc:`doLouvainSubCluster() </subsections/md_rst/doLouvainSubCluster>`
	  - Further Sub-Clustering of Cells Using NN-Network and Louvain Algorithm
	* - :doc:`getClusterSimilarity() </subsections/md_rst/getClusterSimilarity>`
	  - Determine Pairwise Correlation Score
	* - :doc:`mergeClusters() </subsections/md_rst/mergeClusters>`
	  - Merge Clusters
	* - :doc:`getDendrogramSplits() </subsections/md_rst/getDendrogramSplits>`
	  - Split Dendrogram

	* - :doc:`findMastMarkers_one_vs_all() </subsections/md_rst/findMastMarkers_one_vs_all>`

***************************************
Spatial
***************************************

Enrichment & Deconvolution
=============================
*Functions for algorithms to compute spatial enrichment of gene signatures or single-cell RNA-seq annotation.*

.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 2
	:hidden:

	makeSignMatrixPAGE </subsections/md_rst/makeSignMatrixPAGE.rst>
	makeSignMatrixRank </subsections/md_rst/makeSignMatrixRank.rst>
	runSpatialEnrich </subsections/md_rst/runSpatialEnrich.rst>
	createSpatialEnrich </subsections/md_rst/createSpatialEnrich.rst>
	runPAGEEnrich </subsections/md_rst/runPAGEEnrich.rst>
	PAGEEnrich </subsections/md_rst/PAGEEnrich.rst>
	runRankEnrich </subsections/md_rst/runRankEnrich.rst>
	rankEnrich </subsections/md_rst/rankEnrich.rst>
	runHyperGeometricEnrich </subsections/md_rst/runHyperGeometricEnrich.rst>
	hyperGeometricEnrich </subsections/md_rst/hyperGeometricEnrich.rst>
	runSpatialDeconv </subsections/md_rst/runSpatialDeconv.rst>
	runDWLSDeconv </subsections/md_rst/runDWLSDeconv.rst>

.. list-table:: 
	:widths: 100 100 
	:header-rows: 1

	* - Function
	  - Description 
	* - :doc:`makeSignMatrixPAGE() </subsections/md_rst/makeSignMatrixPAGE>`
	  - Convert Gene Signature List To Binary Matrix 
	* - :doc:`makeSignMatrixRank() </subsections/md_rst/makeSignMatrixRank>`
	  - Convert Single-Cell Matrix to Cluster
	* - :doc:`runSpatialEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/runSpatialEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Score With RANK
	* - :doc:`createSpatialEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/createSpatialEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Scores 
	* - :doc:`runPAGEEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/runPAGEEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Position Gene Signature Enrichment With PAGE
	* - :doc:`PAGEEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/PAGEEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature  Enrichment With PAGE
	* - :doc:`runRankEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/runRankEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Using RANK
	* - :doc:`rankEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/rankEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Score With RANK
	* - :doc:`runHyperGeometricEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/runHyperGeometricEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Score With Hypergeometric Test
	* - :doc:`hyperGeometricEnrich() </subsections/md_rst/hyperGeometricEnrich>`
	  - Calculate Gene Signature Enrichment Score With Hypergeometric Test
	* - :doc:`runSpatialDeconv() </subsections/md_rst/runSpatialDeconv>`
	  - Perform Deconvolution 
	* - :doc:`runDWLSDeconv() </subsections/md_rst/runDWLSDeconv>`
	  - Perform DWLS Deconvolution

Spatial Genes
======================
*Functions to identify spatial genes.*

.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 2
	:hidden:

	binSpect </subsections/md_rst/binSpect.rst>
	binSpectSingle </subsections/md_rst/binSpectSingle.rst>
	binSpectMulti </subsections/md_rst/binSpectMulti.rst>
	silhouetteRank </subsections/md_rst/silhouetteRank.rst>
	spatialDE </subsections/md_rst/spatialDE.rst>
	spatialAEH </subsections/md_rst/spatialAEH.rst>
	trendSceek </subsections/md_rst/trendSceek.rst>
	spark </subsections/md_rst/spark.rst>

.. list-table:: 
	:widths: 100 100 
	:header-rows: 1

	* - Function
	  - Description 
	* - :doc:`binSpect() </subsections/md_rst/binSpect>`
	  - Create BinSpect
	* - :doc:`binSpectSingle() </subsections/md_rst/binSpectSingle>`
	  - Create binSpect For Single Network 
	* - :doc:`binSpectMulti() </subsections/md_rst/binSpectMulti>`
	  - binSpect for Multiple KNN Networks 
	* - :doc:`silhouetteRank() </subsections/md_rst/silhouetteRank>`
	  - Create binSpect For Single Network 
	* - :doc:`spatialDE() </subsections/md_rst/spatialDE>`
	  - Compute Spatial Variables With SpatialDE Method 
	* - :doc:`spatialAEH() </subsections/md_rst/spatialAEH>`
	  - Compute Spatial Variables With SpatialAEH Method 
	* - :doc:`trendSceek() </subsections/md_rst/trendSceek>`
	  - Compute Spatially Variable Genes With Trendsceek
	* - :doc:`spark() </subsections/md_rst/spark>`
	  - Compute Spatially Variable Genes With SPARK

Spatial Interaction Changed Genes (ICG)
============================================
*Identify and visualize genes that change in a source cell type due to interaction with another neighboring cell type.*

.. toctree::
	:maxdepth: 2
	:hidden:

	findInteractionChangedGenes </subsections/md_rst/findInteractionChangedGenes.rst>
	findICG </subsections/md_rst/findICG.rst>
	findCellProximityGenes </subsections/md_rst/findCellProximityGenes.rst>
	findCPG </subsections/md_rst/findCPG.rst>
	filterCellProximityGenes </subsections/md_rst/filterCellProximityGenes.rst>
	filterInteractionChangedGenes </subsections/md_rst/filterInteractionChangedGenes.rst>
	filterICG </subsections/md_rst/filterICG.rst>
	filterCPG </subsections/md_rst/filterCPG.rst>
	combineInteractionChangedGenes </subsections/md_rst/combineInteractionChangedGenes.rst>
	combineICG </subsections/md_rst/combineICG.rst>
	combineCellProximityGenes </subsections/md_rst/combineCellProximityGenes.rst>
	combineCPG </subsections/md_rst/combineCPG.rst>
	plotInteractionChangedGenes </subsections/md_rst/plotInteractionChangedGenes.rst>
	plotICG </subsections/md_rst/plotICG.rst>
	plotCellProximityGenes </subsections/md_rst/plotCellProximityGenes.rst>
	plotCPG </subsections/md_rst/plotCPG.rst>
	plotCombineInteractionChangedGenes </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineInteractionChangedGenes.rst>
	plotCombineICG </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineICG.rst>
	plotCombineCellProximityGenes </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineCellProximityGenes.rst>
	plotCombineCPG </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineCPG.rst>

.. list-table:: 
	:widths: 100 100 
	:header-rows: 1

	* - Function
	  - Description 
	* - :doc:`findInteractionChangedGenes() </subsections/md_rst/findInteractionChangedGenes>`
	  - Identify Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`findICG() </subsections/md_rst/findICG>`
	  - Identify Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`findCellProximityGenes() </subsections/md_rst/findCellProximityGenes>`
	  - Identify Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`findCPG() </subsections/md_rst/findCPG>`
	  - Identify Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`filterCellProximityGenes() </subsections/md_rst/filterCellProximityGenes>`
	  - Identify Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`filterInteractionChangedGenes() </subsections/md_rst/filterInteractionChangedGenes>`
	  - Filter The Identified Cell-Cell Interaction Changed Genes (ICGs)
	* - :doc:`filterICG() </subsections/md_rst/filterICG>`
	  - Filter ICGs
	* - :doc:`filterCPG() </subsections/md_rst/filterCPG>`
	  - Filter ICGs
	* - :doc:`combineInteractionChangedGenes() </subsections/md_rst/combineInteractionChangedGenes>`
	  - Combine ICG Scores (Pairwise)
	* - :doc:`combineICG() </subsections/md_rst/combineICG>`
	  - Combine ICG Scores (Pairwise)
	* - :doc:`combineCellProximityGenes() </subsections/md_rst/combineCellProximityGenes>`
	  - Combine ICG Scores (Pairwise)
	* - :doc:`combineCPG() </subsections/md_rst/combineCPG>`
	  - Combine ICG Scores (Pairwise)
	* - :doc:`plotInteractionChangedGenes() </subsections/md_rst/plotInteractionChangedGenes>`
	  - Visualize ICGs via Barplot
	* - :doc:`plotICG() </subsections/md_rst/plotICG>`
	  - Visualize ICGs via Barplot
	* - :doc:`plotCellProximityGenes() </subsections/md_rst/plotCellProximityGenes>`
	  - Visualize Cell Proximity Gene Scores
	* - :doc:`plotCPG() </subsections/md_rst/plotCPG>`
	  - Visualize Cell Proximity Gene Scores
	* - :doc:`plotCombineInteractionChangedGenes() </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineInteractionChangedGenes>`
	  - Visualize Combined ICG Scores 
	* - :doc:`plotCombineICG() </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineICG>`
	  - Visualize Combined ICG Scores 
	* - :doc:`plotCombineCellProximityGenes() </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineCellProximityGenes>`
	  - Visualize Combined ICG Scores 
	* - :doc:`plotCombineCPG() </subsections/md_rst/plotCombineCPG>`
	  - Visualize Combined ICG Scores
